alert.note: Alert for Forrest; Jones; Lamar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Forrest, Lamar and southern Jones Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1059 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mill Creek to Hattiesburg to 9 miles southwest of Baxterville. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Pine Ridge around 1110 PM CDT. Purvis and Mclaurin around 1120 PM CDT. Rock Hill around 1130 PM CDT. Brooklyn around 1135 PM CDT. Maxie around 1145 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Corinth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees. These winds may occur even before thunder is heard.
